short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows to visualize data collected in Piwik PRO Analytics Suite on an underlying website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our website inspector allows you to visualize the data collected on your website by Piwik PRO.

The extension connects with Piwik PRO to display data collected on your website, including heatmaps, clickmaps and scrollmaps. It also helps you debug tracking by showing tracking requests sent from the page.

Requirements:
- To access data, you need an account in Piwik PRO.
- Piwik PRO needs to be set up in a way to collect data for heatmaps, clickmaps and scrollmaps.

To use our extension, follow these steps:
- Click the extension button to open the side panel.
- Log in to Piwik PRO to open the side panel.
- Select heatmap, clickmap or scrollmap.

For a complete setup guide, visit: https://help.piwik.pro/support/collecting-data/site-inspector.

If you have questions about the plugin or need to report bugs, email us at site-inspector@piwik.pro.
